hero.description: I am an AI Engineer (Student) with a keen focus on Machine Learning and cutting-edge technologies like Generative AI.

about.pageSubtitle: My journey in Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering.
about.bio1: I am Bintang Ramadhan, an aspiring AI Engineer driven by the potential of Generative AI and Machine Learning. My focus goes beyond theory I love building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.
about.bio2: With a strong foundation in Python and the TensorFlow ecosystem, I specialize in developing scalable solutions involving Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation). Whether it's fine-tuning LLMs or building API-driven applications with FastAPI, I aim to deliver software that creates tangible value.
about.bio3: Currently, I am actively seeking internship opportunities or challenging collaborations where I can apply my skills, learn from experienced professionals, and contribute to innovative projects.
about.educationDescription: Active Member of Linux Study Group (Focus on OS Architecture & Troubleshooting).
about.experienceDescription: Developing personal projects focused on Generative AI and RAG. Building full-stack applications with React and FastAPI.
about.contactDescription: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
